{"id":915027921,"question_id":42,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"12Â months","timestamp":1678801768,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/915027921/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int ans = 0;\n        for(int i = 1; i < height.size(); i++){\n           int lmax = -1, rmax = -1, lidx = i - 1, ridx = i + 1;\n           while(lidx > -1) lmax = max(lmax, height[lidx--]);\n           while(ridx < height.size()) rmax = max(rmax, height[ridx++]);\n           if(lmax <= height[i] || rmax <= height[i]) continue;\n           //cout << i << ' ' << lmax << ' ' << rmax << endl;\n           ans += min(lmax, rmax) - height[i];\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
